data.title: Adjunct Associate Professor Chonnipa Nantavithya, M.D.
data.meta_description: BIOGRAPHIEEDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS 2015-Present: Radiation oncologist of Division of Therapeutic Radiation and Oncology, Department of Radiology, King Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital (KCMH) 2019 – Present Assistant Editor, Journal of Thai Association of Radiation Oncology 2017-2018: Visiting Scientist, University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center, Houston, US 2016: Observership Program, Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, US 2016: Certificate
